creator: christophe.dirlik@libertysurf.fr
text:
I try to build the 1.0 version form the sources. I used the 1_4_2_05 SDK from 
sun, and the Build ended with FAILED.

I ran the build with 1_4_1_07 SDK, and it was OK.

     [echo] Compiling Source
    [javac] Compiling 93 source files to D:\Installation de logiciels tÚlÚchargÚ
s\Apache\xml-xindice-1.0\java\classes
    [javac] Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
    [javac] Note: Recompile with -deprecation for details.

With version 1.4.2, the deprecated API seems to be more severe...
Xindice 1.0 won't build with newer Xalan.
creator: vgritsenko@apache.org
